column_stem: # === P&L ITEMS — QUARTERLY + ANNUAL (88 companies diverge between quarterly sum and annual column) ===

notes: Quarterly preferred — annual columns unreliable for ~818 companies
Annual total expenditure (quarterly totalexp is separate)

column_stem: # === FULLSTATS — PRE-COMPUTED QUARTERLY GROWTH/TTM (not yet wired) ===

notes: Pre-computed TTM sales — we compute our own

column_stem: # === FULLSTATS — BANKING ANNUAL (naming now CONFIRMED correct: YYYY_metric) ===

notes: CASA % of deposits. Naming fixed in latest fullstats
Net interest margin %. Already computed from quarterly but fullstats gives direct

column_stem: # === PROPOSED NEW TIER 1 — FROM ACCORD (6 columns to add to fullstats) ===

notes: Accord: CF_Changes In Working Capital. Replaces BS estimation. Critical for negative-NWC companies
Accord: BS_Number of Equity Shares Paid Up. Replaces MCap/CMP approximation
Accord: FH_Capital Employed. Direct ROCE denominator replacing (PBT+Int)/(NW+Debt)
Accord: FR_Dividend Pay Out Ratio(%). Cross-check for reinvestment = 1 - payout
Accord: CF_Tax Paid. Actual cash tax vs accrual 1-(PAT/PBT)
Accord: ERD_% of Turnover. R&D for PHARMA/DEFENSE/MEDICAL_EQUIP/PRODUCT_SAAS
Legacy screener.in sector — use valuation_group instead
Legacy screener.in industry — use valuation_subgroup instead
